title: Proof of Insurance
description: 保険の証明を確認するためのコストは、お客様に転嫁される追加のエクスポージャーとなり、結果として保険料が高くなります。

f6_assessments.q0:
This is an idea to use metadata to reduce the cost of insurance. However there is not detail as to what will actually be done. What does " product specific metadata structure that is verified in metadata" mean?
 This proposer has proposed or co-proposed a number of other project with little details and/or funding requests such as:
Pharo ACM - $1
Proof of Insurance - no details
communitybond.io Integrate- no details
Community Bond -Loyalty Rewards - no details
Community Bond - Metadata - no details
Trade Finance and Credit Insurance - minimal details
dRisk - $5
Endangered Language Preservation - no details
Locating Culture - no details
NAGchi - no details
NAGchi Cares - no details
f6_assessments.q1: Please provide a plan so that it can be evaluated. As it stands, there is not plan so it cannot be implemented successfully. Given the widely varying experience quoted in all the other proposal submitted, some evidence should be provided.
f6_assessments.q2: No information has been provided on what will be produced by when so this is not a project than can be auditied.

f6_assessments.q0: That's not the first proposal by this proposer, who just throws some idea and doesn't put any details. So either he is joking around (but that's not funny) or he is some kind of strange spammer. Either way - I can't put more than 1
f6_assessments.q1: No, it won't be implemented as the proposer creates proposals for any other reason than for implementation. In several Funds there are several proposals by him, all united that they have no plan, no details, just some basic info.
f6_assessments.q2: Maybe proposer thinks voters are stupid and if you create proposals with nice names in different categories - some of them might pass. Anyway, it won't be possible to audit such a proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: This look a great idea. I'm not an expert in insurance area but the insurances must have access to information about the client (medical, educational background, professional background, other from other insurances) and this information in the blockchain in conjunction with ATALA Prism DID's would be of great value for risk, like an oracle of the individuals
f6_assessments.q1: There is insufficient information in the proposal. It is unknown previous projects and linkedin information, for example.
f6_assessments.q2: There is no information about auditing the progress and success of the proposal

f6_assessments.q0: Draft proposal. I would recommend including more information and data about the problem. There is not enough information for impact assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.
f6_assessments.q1: Draft proposal. There is not enough information for feasibility assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.
f6_assessments.q2: Draft proposal. There is not enough information for auditability assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.

f6_assessments.q0: This Proposal lack plan detail , no road map , no KPIs , No start date , it not clear what the proposal is set to achieve .
f6_assessments.q1: Quasar has been active in the cardano community and i have seen various of his proposal , The proposer has a domain expertise as provided but lack the technical Skills to implement this. Also there is no information provided if he will hire a cardano blockchain developer to implement the project , for that I  disagree that the experience and plan given is highly likely this proposal will be implemented successfully , so i score 2
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal lack clear plan , no road map , no start date , the information provided is not sufficient to audit the progress of this proposal. for that i score 1

f6_assessments.q0: The problem statement is good and if it was expanded there may be a good proposal that could be made from this. Blockchain of eery sort has the ability to build trust in low trust environments. An NFT as an insurance contract could be a valuable extension of this.
f6_assessments.q1: There is a statement of experience but there is no way to verify the statement unfortunately. It would be great if the proposer could include some links or an attachment.
f6_assessments.q2: There are no KPIs or timeline provided. There is a budget available but it is not clear what this will be used for. It would be god if the proposer could provide these.

f6_assessments.q0: This is no complete proposal and does not fulfill formal criteria.
f6_assessments.q1: No plan is presented, no proof of experience is provided and no rationale is given for the budget.
f6_assessments.q2: No, the information provided is not sufficient to audit the proposal at all.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal does not provide any information as to how they will use metadata to solve this problem. It merely states a problem with a statement that makes. 0 sense. "create an insurance product specific metadata that is structured in metadata" .... this almost seems liike gibberish from someone just shooting out proposals.
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal does not give us any info on their plan, and the stated experience from this proposer contradicts the experience stated in a different proposal in this fund. No proof to any of their experience, and no presented plan or structure.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal does not provide any information that would allow us to audit the success and progress of the proposal. There would be no way to measure accountability when there is no plan provided.

solution: メタデータで検証された保険商品固有のメタデータ構造を作成します。
experience: 保険とリスクマネジメントの分野でキャリアを積み、保険業界向けのブロックチェーンを中心としたソリューションに取り組んできました。
